text: Abo ni bo bahakanye bakanabakumira kugana Umusigiti Mutagatifu (w’i Maka), ndetse bakanafatira amatungo gutangwaho ibitambo ntagere aho yari yagenewe gutambirwa. Iyo hataba abemeramana b’abagabo n’abemeramana b’abagore (bari mu banzi banyu mwari muhanganye) mutari muzi, mwari kubica cyangwa mukabahutaza mutabizi; bityo mukabarwaho icyaha mutagambiriye gukora. (Ibyo byabayeho) kugira ngo Allah agirire impuhwe uwo ashatse. Kandi n’iyo (abemeramana) baza gutandukana (n’abahakanyi), abahakanye muri bo twari kubahanisha ibihano bibabaza
